```{r}
library(tidyverse, ggplot2)
library(ggfortify)
library(robust)
nfl_tib <- here::here("data/nfl.csv") |> readr::read_csv()
```

```{r}
nfl_tib = nfl_tib %>% rename(height = "Height (inches)")
```

```{r}
View(nfl_tib)
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = nfl_tib,
    aes(x = "Weight (lbs)",
    y = Position)) +
    geom_violin()
```
